title: Got Banned due to a missing file
body:
i moved the game from my PC to another PC due to the lag on my PC and when i started the game i found out that there was a file missing and that prevented the client from opening and got banned 

the file name is  D3DX9_39.DLL 
i downloaded it already but still i have the ban . 
can u remove it please ?

replies.body: I went ahead and double checked your account, buuuuuut it doesn't look like there's actually any ban associated with this one. Let me know if you were talking about a different account and I can check that one as well.

That's odd, normally if a file was missing the client would automatically do a file-repair/update to fix it before allowing you into the game. 
Hope you can get some answers :)
